titles.title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Joseph M. Perez for acts of valor while serving as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.
To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Joseph M. Perez for acts of valor while serving as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to Joseph M. Perez for his acts of valor on May 26, 1967, while serving in the Army during the Vietnam War. Joseph M. Perez was previously awarded the Distinguished Service Cross for his actions.
